values.help:
Current Overload Protection. Load will be closed when
      the Current more than 39.5A and the time more than 5
      seconds
values.label: Current Overload Protection

values.help: Enables automatic notifications to associated devices whenever there is a state change.
values.label: Notification status

values.help: The minimum change in wattage for a report to be sent.
values.label: Wattage threshold

values.help: Minimum change in percent of wattage to send a report.
values.label: Wattage threshold percent

values.help:
Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default. Reverts to 0
	after set.
values.label: Default Group Reports

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC (KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC (watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC (Current)
		     bit 0 MRC (Voltage)

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.
values.label: Report type G1

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC (KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC (watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC (Current)
		     bit 0 MRC (Voltage)

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.
values.label: Report type G2

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC (KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC (watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC (Current)
		     bit 0 MRC (Voltage)

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.
values.label: Report type G3

values.help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.
values.label: Default Group Time

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.
values.label: Send interval G1

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.
values.label: Send interval G2

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.
values.label: Send interval G3

items.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network
